text:
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> I plan to develop CRM card for our HubSpot app. We wish to enhance the look and feel of the card, make some CSS changes (like add background color, design button).
We have referred to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/custom-cards>
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/crm-extensions/crm-extensions-overview>

But these cover functional aspects and not UI aspects of customising the card.
For reference, something like below
